pullRequest.body:
Speed up the file by about 34% by doing the following
- add a few shortcut instances
- squeeze simps where the full form is short and a clear win, also when it's clearly worth it (use `says` in this case)
- "squeeze" three really slow `field_simp` calls: replace them by the equivalent `simp` invocation and squeeze that
- avoid some expensive `convert`s
- squeeze two really slow `nlinarith` calls (they're still slow, but *much* better)
- replace one `congr!` by `congr`

This file is still very slow: some `nlinarith` calls and a few slow `convert`s are the main offenders.
Help fixing any of these is welcome (but also perfect for a subsequent PR).

---

This file still contains a number of notes about slow parts: if this PR looks good in principle, I'll happily take those out.
If you see them and feel like scratching that itch, be my guest!

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: !bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/f7552e23-4ce1-40c8-b47b-a9ca566cfcf8) for commit 824aa4a7d8cee6680510ec99dad2f55beab3c2e1.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/e2309be2-ad64-4495-a42b-b4c00a3b80c4) for commit 01703cfec1a5be1a236f22f44163cefe6cef3ab9.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/a2233111-8846-4412-abf6-a1ede0495e4a/to/e2309be2-ad64-4495-a42b-b4c00a3b80c4) against commit 6f758e582b2ad1cb121bf88aa1a178e284315af5:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                 Metric         Change
  ===============================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Instances.Sphere               instructions   -20.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.VectorBundle.FiberwiseLinear   instructions   -38.7%
```

The latest commit should speed up this file even more; #13459 will benchmark this also.
Update: in the other benchmark, this file is even sped up by 30%.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/82919345-c5d4-43fd-975a-84a6afeb0e53) for commit 28617666be7c58a50aa90be024802e878b3c6bfb.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/adaa9fd6-ef3e-485c-b1ac-42797b426d0a) for commit 42efba3d0573971469083f4c678037805b06c5df.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/cf21f700-6626-4465-a96a-486e0deda7d5/to/adaa9fd6-ef3e-485c-b1ac-42797b426d0a) against commit b70b6b2a534b6c46e93a570515c5e3fa334ba7f4:
```diff
  Benchmark                                     Metric         Change
  ===================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Instances.Sphere   instructions   -34.5%
```

Marking as awaiting-author to
- file proper tracking issues about the field_simp hacks
- fix the instances properly: `making Submodule.span return a type a'la #12386 might help`
I've split out #15488 for a hopefully less controversial subset of these changes.

### PR summary [8ea8076a8b](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13456/commits/8ea8076a8b43391d66bab11f50ed0ef5629ac224)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ instAddMonoid`
`+ instCompleteSpace`
`+ instFiniteDimensional`
`+ instFoo`
`+ instOrthogonalProjection`
`+ instProperSpace`
`+ instZeroHomClass`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/a5a73d84-09b1-4ada-bc36-2585e48abd27) for commit 8ea8076a8b43391d66bab11f50ed0ef5629ac224.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/b60d7b55-1a4a-46ed-b736-2526d81f09e8/to/a5a73d84-09b1-4ada-bc36-2585e48abd27) against commit f2cd6eff0575997cb37e755f7249be3d1c5e2f9c:
```diff
  Benchmark                                     Metric         Change
  ===================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.Manifold.Instances.Sphere   instructions   -19.5%
```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion ```
